Lumos Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
APSFGenerates the rendering filter
BLUE_NOISEDaniel Dunbar's blue noise generator
CELLBasic cell data structure of the quadtree
CG_SOLVERConjugate gradient Poisson solver
CG_SOLVER_SSEConjugate gradient Poisson solver that exploits SSE
DAGDirected acyclic graph that renders the final lightning
EXRWrapper for the ILM OpenEXR routines
FFTWrapper class for FFTW
QUAD_DBM_2DQuadtree DBM solver. This is the highest level class
QUAD_POISSONQuadtree Poisson solver
